short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: World Clock Extension For Google Chrome - Fast & Easy to Use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My World Clock is a free new tab extension that allows you to see the current time in the top cities of the world (Mumbai, London, Tokyo and New York) at a glance, along with a customizable web search bar to search for things on the internet. The extension has been designed in order to ensure that you are productive and abreast with the times, especially when it comes to scheduling calls with your work teams abroad or just getting a better idea of timezones. Bing.com will be your default search engine to browse online.
How to get started:

Once the extension is downloaded and added to Chrome (browser) as an extension, open a new tab, click on the My World Clock icon in your browser and voila!
For a seamless search experience, all you need to do is type in the text you want to look up and click the arrow on the Bing.com default search box to get instant search results. 

Features:
• Current time in 4 top cities (Mumbai, London, Tokyo and New York) 
• Reliable web search engine by Bing.com
• Clean interface
Permissions
The extension requires permission to allow new tabs display the extension's features - custom search, My World Clocks and background image. The extension does not store or share any user data.

Uninstallation
To uninstall the extension in Chrome, go to chrome://extensions/ and locate  "My World Clock", click on Remove and you will be prompted with a pop up "Remove My World Clock?", click the Remove button.


By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install " My World Clocs" Chrome extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Please refer to our Privacy Policy (https://mediastinct.com/privacy-policy/) and Terms of Use (https://mediastinct.com/terms-conditions/). For any queries, please contact us at dev@mediastinct.com
